Comment: A lawyer for anti-war activist Mahmoud Khalil, currently being held by ICE, says she was barred from using a computer in a key hearing—an example, experts say, of the unfairness of immigration court.  Read the full article: [https://www.wired.com/story/computer-ban-unfair-mahmoud-khalil-ice/](https://www.wired.com/story/computer-ban-unfair-mahmoud-khalil-ice/)

Comment: I’m going to fuss at you about the paywall. Not because I don’t think you deserve to be paid for your work; I absolutely believe journalists should be paid for their work. Hell I used to subscribe to your print service more than a decade ago. But rather because I do not want to have to pay for a subscription that I’ll inevitably forget I have or underutilize. Moreover that I’ll pay for the article and still be inundated with advertisements and trackers… it’s frustrating
Author: AVGuy42
